title: c++_stl
leetcode
content: Leetcode1. Sliding Window// 1. Sliding Window with fixed size// 1456 Maximum Number of Vowels in a Substring of Given Length// 1. Enter the windowfor(int i = 0; i < s.length(); i++){    if(s[i] == 'a' || s[i] == 'e' || s[i] == 'i' || s[i] == 'o' || s[i] == 'u'){        vowel++;    }    if(i < k - 1) {        continue; // Not enough characters to form a window    }    // 2. Update the answer    ans = max(ans, vowel);    // 3. Slide the window    char out = s[i - k + 1];    if(out == 'a' || out == 'e' || out == 'i' || out == 'o' || out == 'u'){        vowel--;    }}

title: Welcome to use Hexo Theme Keep
content:
Welcome to use Hexo Theme Keep.
This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Keep theme, you can ask me on GitHub.



Quick StartCreate a new post$ hexo new "My New Post"

More info: Writing
Run server$ hexo server

More info: Server
Generate static files$ hexo generate

More info: Generating
Deploy to remote sites$ hexo deploy

More info: Deployment
